column3: is a town in Zawiercie County Silesian Voivodeship Poland with 4282 inhabitants.It is noted for the extensive ruins of a medieval castle.The castle was built in the 14th century by the Sulimczyk family.

is a village in Gmina Skala in Cracow County Lesser Poland Voivodeship in southern Poland.It is one of the sights of the Eagle Nests Trail (Szlak Orlich Gniazd) as there are the ruins of a gothic castle near the village.
